title: BEAUTIFUL STUDIO NEAR LEATHER DISTRICT & AMAZING FOOD NEAR BY!!
posting_body: Moving to Boston or ready for a new place in the city?
Find your new home here and immerse yourself in this urban retreat near the Leather District, Chinatown, and the Theater District.
The unit features hardwood flooring throughout common spaces and bedrooms.
Kitchen is well appointed and fully applianced with top of the line finishes, cabinet space, and functionality.
All high efficiency, stainless steel appliances are outlined with gorgeous hardwood cabinetry giving the space a modern feel.
-Conference room, lounge and game room, and spacious lobby with coffee bar
Cat friendly with a dog bathing station -- NO PET FEE!!!!
-Large windows in living and bedrooms spaces
MY FULL FEE PAID BY DEVELOPER!
*Pricing, brokerage coverage, and availability subject to change without notice based on availability, lease term, and move-in date selected.
Pictures may be of similar unit, could cause minor changes to finishes unit to unit.
The apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.
